properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 b1 c1

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
F
Father of creation
Unfold Your sovereign plan
Raise up a chosen generation
That will march through the land

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
All of creation is longing
For Your unveiling of power
Would You release Your anointing
Oh God let this be the hour

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Let Your glory fall in this room
Let it go forth from here to the nations
Let Your fragrance rest in this place
As we gather to seek Your face

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Ruler of the nations
The world has yet to see
The full release of Your promise
The church in victory

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Turn to us Lord and touch us
Make us strong in Your might
Overcome our weakness
That we could stand up and fight

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Let Your kingdom come
(echo: Let Your kingdom come)
Let Your will be done
(Let Your will be done)
Let us see on earth
(Let us see on earth)
The glory of Your Son *repeat
